Machine learning basemodel

class autoop.core.ml.model.model.Model(type, parameters)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for machine learning models

abstract fit(X, Y)[source]

Fits the model to the training data. :Param X : The input data for training. :Param Y : The target labels for training.

Return type:

None

property parameters: dict

Getter function for the private _parameters attribute :returns: A deep copy of the parameters :rtype: dict

abstract predict(X)[source]

Generates predicitions. :Param X : The input data for prediction. :Returns : Predicted values based on the input data.

Return type:

ndarray

to_artifact(name)[source]

Makes the model class into a artifact :type name: str :param name: The name of the model :type name: str

Returns:

The data of the model stored in an artifact

Return type:

Artifact

property type: Literal['regression', 'classification']

Getter function for the model type :returns: The type of the model :rtype: Literal[“regression”, “classification”]
